title: When does Lunar revel end?
body: I can't get RP until tomorrow and have been waiting FOR DRAGON BLADE RIVEN TO BE BACK SINCE THE LAST LUNAR REVEL ENDED! Riot if I don't get this skin I will cry tears of blood. I didn't get championship Riven when I had RP for it cause I was like, "meh it will be back on legacy sale" BUT INSTEAD I BOUGHT MY 3rd Rammus skin.  I NEEEEED DRAGON BLADE RIVEN RIOT! I NEED IT, PLEASE DO NOT END THE LUNAR REVEL UNTIL I HAVE IT, ok?

replies.body:
Considering the Event is a celebration of Chinese New Year and it's only the 15th of February, you have ***at least*** 4 days.

I'm sure all the relevant information is on the Promo Page or Lunar Revel Sales Page, too, if you had to forethought of at least checking there before making this post.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-new-year-these-lunar-revel-sales

nah I cbf to find stuff I just get nice people like you to do it for me. :)
+1

24th 7pm. (midnight on the 23rd in America) in case your wondering "why 7pm, thats weird"

>  These Legacy skins and bundles are all available through 18:59 AEDT on February 24.
how do you know about this
Read you ignorant twat. All the information has literally been linked in this thread.
i really want dragonblade riven and i dont want to find out that it ends earlier

how do you know about this
how do you know exactly when it will end
Yeah would be a shame to miss out on such a sexy skin :c hope you get it

Like please Riot I give you my money, $10 for this skin(have to pay $15 cause oce op and rp amounts are based off exchange rate from US, so in the US it would be exactly $10 but in oce you have to buy $15 of rp)!!!!!!!
